appDescription.message: Rolodink: your note layer on top of LinkedIn, your modern rolodex.

subtitle.message: Manage your LinkedIn connections in one place with Rolodink

msg_account_created.message: Account created! Check your email for confirmation.

clean_names_description.message: Remove notification counts like "(1)" or "(2)" from profile names in your connections.

profile_context_field_description.message: Show a note field on LinkedIn profiles of your connections.

change_password_description.message: Change your password for extra security.

export_data_description.message: Download a complete overview of all your connections and notes as a JSON file.

delete_account_description.message: Permanently delete your account and all related data. This action cannot be undone.

privacy_policy_description.message: Read our privacy policy to understand how we protect and use your data.

tip_2.message: Add contact details you might need later

empty_list_desc.message: Add your first LinkedIn connection by clicking the "Add to CRM" button on a LinkedIn profile.

help_subtitle.message: Everything you need to know about the Rolodink extension

section_what_is_p1.message: Rolodink is a Chrome extension that helps you manage your LinkedIn connections better. Instead of getting lost in a long list of connections, you can now easily add notes, track contact moments, and maintain your network effectively.

section_what_is_p2.message: LinkedIn has great tools for networking, but no built-in CRM functionality. This extension fills that gap by helping you store and manage valuable information about your connections.

step_1_desc.message: Go to a LinkedIn profile and click the "Add to CRM" button that appears automatically.

step_2_desc.message: Indicate where you met this person and add notes about your conversation.

step_3_desc.message: View all connections, search through notes, and keep your network up-to-date.

feature_notes_desc.message: Add personal notes about conversations, appointments, and follow-ups.

feature_location_desc.message: Track where you met each connection (conference, event, etc.).

feature_company_desc.message: Note which company you worked at when you met this person.

feature_search_desc.message: Quickly search through all your connections and notes with the built-in search function.

feature_filter_desc.message: Filter connections by notes, recent additions, and more.

feature_settings_desc.message: Manage your account, change your password, and use extra tools.

tip_effective_desc.message: Note concrete details: what you discussed, follow-up actions, and contact details you might need later.

tip_update_desc.message: Add notes immediately after a meeting while the details are still fresh in your memory.

tip_quality_desc.message: It's better to have a smaller network with rich information than many connections without context.

tip_followup_desc.message: Use your notes to plan follow-up conversations and keep your network warm.

faq_button_title.message: The "Add to CRM" button doesn't appear

faq_button_desc.message: Make sure you are logged in to the extension and that you are on a LinkedIn profile page. Refresh the page if the button doesn't appear.

faq_export_desc.message: Yes, the export functionality is available in the settings. You can export your connections to CSV or Excel.

faq_security_desc.message: Absolutely. All data is stored securely and encrypted. You have full control over your own information.

faq_multiple_title.message: Can I use the extension on multiple computers?

faq_multiple_desc.message: Yes, you can log in on different computers and have access to your connections and notes everywhere.

contact_intro.message: Do you have questions or problems with the Rolodink extension? We are happy to help!

contact_feature_desc.message: Do you have ideas for new features? We'd love to hear them!
